item.description:
A late afternoon matinee, followed by dinner, at one of the following venues:

Parkade Cinemas in Manchester, followed by dinner at Shady Glen (yumm... fried cheeseburgers)

Bow-Tie Art Cinema in Hartford, followed by dinner at the Chowder Pot

or

Palace 17 Cinema in Hartford, home of the self-service butter bar, after which we may not need dinner!

You'll have to check back closer to the date when we know which movies are playing and final details will be posted!

Suzanne is our host, so be sure to RSVP so she knows to look for you.

===

Update! Suzanne has settled on the Parkade Cinemas in Manchester and Shady Glen, so it should be an economical, and yummy evening! Check the movie choices here and when you RSVP, let us know which one you are most interested in seeing.
item.name: A Movie and Dinner
